scripts.docker:dev:down: docker compose -f compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.development down --remove-orphans && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker:dev:down:volumes: docker compose -f compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.development down -v --remove-orphans && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker:dev:db:migrate: docker exec money_app_dev npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.docker:dev:db:rollback: docker exec money_app_dev npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.docker:dev:studio: docker exec -it money_app_dev npx prisma studio --hostname 0.0.0.0
